entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move Built-in marshalling tests to use DNNE and live under the System.RuntimeInteropServices test tree #84451
    Future
  • Consider calling the managed methods from CastCache instead of having native implementation. #84448
  • Most recent MIBC optimization data contains a combo of block and edge counts crashing JIT in Crossgen2 #84446
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier() #84445
  • Interop source generator testing improvements #84441
  • WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ServiceCanStopItself fails in CI #84438
  • Quic tests AVing on free #84435
    8.0.0
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Text.Json.Tests.WorkItemExecution timing out #84434
  • Aot Analyzer shouldn't warn when passing a const string to RequiresDynamicCode applied to Types #84433
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Encoding.TryGetBytes/Chars #84425
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add StructuredLoggingFormat to StringSyntaxAttribute #84423
    Future
  • Casting via generic math still doesn't always inline #84421
  • Inliner fails to inline a simple RVA pattern #84416
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfNotZero` #84415
  • Feature Request: Support handling more histograms in MetricsEventSource #84412
    8.0.0
  • [linux-arm64] System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException in AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs.InvokeContinuation #84407
  • dynamic with RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException #84406
  • TimeSpanConverter should support converting without seconds (hh:mm) #84405
  • DisabledRuntimeMarshalling_Disabled_NativeAssemblyDisabled failing with NativeAOT #84402
    8.0.0
  • CctorForWrite failing with NativeAOT #84400
  • StackallocTests.Test4096 failing EnsureZeroed check #84398
  • [7.0] tvos arm64 mono: Failed to list devices #84394
    7.0.x
  • [6.0] Assert failed in coreclr linux arm: GCHeapUtilities::GetGCHeap()->IsInFrozenSegment(obj) #84393
    6.0.x
  • Test failure DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_MyPersonSurrogate_Stress #84392

Closed

  • A few AVX tests failing when XSAVE is disabled at OS level #47317
    Future
  • Move startup hook tests targeting `StartupHookProvider` out of hosting tests #77805
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tests failed on windows: System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterTests.ImageConverterTest #34755
    Future
  • GC.GetConfigurationVariables() not respecting "System.GC.HighMemoryPercent" #84198
    8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Common.Tests and more tests are failing for missing opcode 'rcompare' on Power. #84401
  • [8.0-preview2] error MSB4012: The expression "CompileListCount=@(_ReadyToRunCompileList->Count())" cannot be used in this context #82795
    8.0.0
  • Failure to build pri-1 tests #81984
    8.0.0
  • superpmi unit test dependencies build issue #76421
    8.0.0
  • How to tell if a connect timeout is caused by caller or callee? #83993
  • WASM DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.JSConditionalBreakpoint Failure #84367
    8.0.0
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.* test failures in CI #83655
  • Wasm debugger test timing out #83847
    8.0.0
  • Incorrect comparison of cyrillic words [net6] #84251
    6.0.x
  • SPC: Set PlatformType property to arm64 instead of AnyCPU for arm64 builds #84424
  • Type.IsValueType returns true for type parameter constrained to Enum #84256
  • Change loop cloning to work with pre-header blocks #62665
    8.0.0
  • Loop canonicalization should always create loop pre-headers #77033
    8.0.0
  • ComWrappers feature imbalance between platforms #56474
    8.0.0
  • find library=Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.arm64.dll [0]; #84286
  • Property display name set via DisplayAttribute in validation messages are not used when app is native AOT published but are when trimmed #84324
    8.0.0
  • Libraries with hardcoded `netstandard2.0` AssemblyVersions are shipping incorrect AssemblyVersions in servicing. #84031
    8.0.0
  • APICompat for ref-pack servicing #42961
    8.0.0
  • [Android] System.Net.Sockets BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived test is failing #81946
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.TryWrite for UTF8 #79376
    8.0.0
  • [Mono][Android][TEST] GC/Scenarios/Dynamo/dynamo/dynamo.sh failed #53350
    8.0.0
  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "str wzr, [reg]" to "str xzr" #35136
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfEqual and ThrowIfNotEqual #82667
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][eventpipe] fixup DS_EXIT_BLOCKING_PAL_SECTION in checked build #84455
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-GC-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Added containment support for `shlx`, `sarx`, `shrx` #84453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a test for warning behavior of Requires on type with a const field #84452
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Mitigation for #84446: comment out problematic JIT assertion check #84449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make service wait on its state before stopping #84447
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/7.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84444
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/6.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84443
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part (backport #84413) #84442
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add config binder generator to ASP.NET Core transport pack #84436
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #84432
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • Extend PreInitialization Support to readonly GC fields #84431
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Using the same CastCache implementation as in CoreClr #84430
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avx512 arithmetic #84429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: scalable profile counter mode #84427
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotate XslCompiledTransform as RequiresDynamicCode. #84426
    area-System.Xml
  • [mono][tests] Re-enable test #84419
    needs-area-label
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement locale native functions #84417
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Mark the return type of the JsonSerializer.GetTypeInfo method as nullable. #84411
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Start running Loader and Interop tests for NativeAOT #84404
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Perform ldr to ldp peephole optimization #84399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tell coverlet to respect the [DoesNotReturn] attribute for coverage purposes #84396
    needs-area-label
  • Allow prefix match in StressLogAnalyzer #84395
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Simplify numasupport #84207
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration #84339
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move startup hook tests targeting `StartupHookProvider` out of hosting tests #84338
    area-Host
  • JIT: Set GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED properly in block morph #84352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix eventpipe/enabledisable.cs test on Android #84409
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Correctly display the GCSettings specified in the runtimeconfig json via the GC Configuration API Call #84201
    area-GC-coreclr
  • added explanation to more GC data structures #84162
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Unit tests should re-enable BinaryFormatter for compat testing #84437
    area-Meta
  • [mono][jit] Revert parts of '[mono] Remove the support for non r4fp, its not used by any supported platforms. (#82005)' #84418
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable building preview workload components #84365
    area-Workloads
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (3/3) IL Lowering & Outputting #83716
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Reserving two diagnostic codes for serialization work #84439
    area-Meta
  • Fixes for BuildAsStandalone in tests #84374
    test-bug, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing test case that is not working on chrome anymore #84440
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix pinned assembly version 7.0 #84355
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Fix pinned assembly version 6.0 #84357
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.16
  • Disable StackallocBlkTests test on Mono #84408
    needs-area-label
  • Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part. #84413
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Move over all interop generator unit tests to use raw string literals #84391
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix Ordinal Ignore Case string compare #84386
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.17
  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (2/3) thunk & tramponlie #83715
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Use better trimming message in ValidationContext #84326
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • Don't overwrite pinned assembly versions in servicing #84079
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][interp] Remove MINT_LEAVE opcode #84410
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][tests] Properly triage known GC failure #84403
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Implement LEAVE_CHECK in the jiterpreter (as a bailout) #84387
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Utf8.TryWrite #83852
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix Roslyn dependency version in source-build #84366
    blocking, area-Infrastructure, partner-impact
  • Disable nullability checks in file shared between the managed type system and ILVerificationTests #84382
    area-Tools-ILVerification
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assert. #84385
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix ThunkGenerator #84390
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Add back IComparable-based optimization to FrozenDictionary/Set #84301
    area-System.Collections
  • Arm64: Optimize pairs of "str wzr" to "str xzr" #84350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Update CodeAnalysis.src.globalconfig #84059
    area-Meta
  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Derived Interface support in ComInterfaceGenerator #84271
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #84322
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part2 (down-level support) #84235
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Use a tuned ConcurrentDictionary in the default caching implementation for the COM source generator #84335
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: Add a (disabled) prototype for a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid unnecessary GTF_GLOB_REFs #84349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reduce the trim requirements on MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute #84369
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Obsolete most of the remaining legacy serialization APIs #84383
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • In Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator targets, respect Optimize property. #82374
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `gtGetStructHandle` and friends #84212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify target to enable config binding src generator and rename enabling property #84379
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement proper parsing for primitives in config binding gen #84154
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` compare #84249
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add HttpClient.Shared #84327
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84337
    area-codeflow
  • [mono] fix two call get_default_jit_mm make hotreload work in non default alc #84247
    area-EnC-mono, community-contribution
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Revert Release job changes for runtimelab.yml #2247

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI generates invalid '$' token in method name #31657
  • GenAPI can generate ambiguous call to base constructor #31655
  • Add support for `--disable-build-servers` to more MSBuild-driven commands #31651
  • Many bool-accepting options do not handle an argument correctly #31646
  • Creating a plugin project will copy dependencies of your plugin base to the plugins output #31636

Closed

  • Cannot run dotnet test on solution filter files (slnf) #11417
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract includes XML and other files into output binary #19322
    8.0.1xx
  • PlatformTarget is not set when Platform is "arm64" (MSBuild) #15434

PullRequests

Created

  • Register off-by-default analyzer: configuration binding generator #31654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • [release/7.0.3xx] containers: removed stack trace from logged error message #31639
    Area-Containers
  • Bundle Source Link packages #31632
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disable BinaryFormatter across most .NET 8 project types #31591
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix order of targets in WasmNestedPublishAppDependsOn #31640
    Area-AspNetCore
  • extend search table with trusted and owners info #31403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.117 #31602
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] GenAPI: a work around for a generation an explicit interface implementation indexer. #31628
    Area-GenAPI
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • [WIP do no review yet] Use MSBuild Server in interactive mode only #31597
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault property #31626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prep 7.0.3xx for GA release #31618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: file local types #5529
    11.0
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Proposal: "Closed" enum types #3179
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Update primary-constructors.md based on recent LDM decisions #7099

Merged

  • Add collection literals working group notes 2023-04-05 #7098

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interactive Window: Completion window stays up after executing #reset command #67676
    Backlog
  • EE: Autos Window includes identifier of method on method calls #67674
    Backlog
  • Remove AnalyzerExecutor.CancellationToken property #67670
  • Compiler can't find System.Collections.Immutable 6.0.0 #67668
  • Rename symbol misses symbol used in invalid assignment #67665

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33605.613 #67667

PullRequests

Created

  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update compiler tool set to 4.5.0 #67683
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dev/dibarbet/fix pr val #67682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make IOptionsSerializationService (and others) regular MEF services #67681
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move tagging and classification over to using SegmentedLists from ArrayBuilders. #67680
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only pack the shipping/non-shipping nupkgs for roslyn #67679
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Switch all usages of Locations[0] to GetFirstLocation() #67678
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Set current culture when Interactive Window is initialized #67677
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Provide a no-alloc way to get the first location of a symbol #67675
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Reduce number of invocations to StateSet.GetOrCreateActiveFileState #67669
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Adjust solution crawler logic to choose next best project to reduce expensive allocations #67666
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not store parameter locations in an array. #67661
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Improve performance if testing if a trivia is strutured trivia or not. #67651
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Remove unused TS brace completion code"" #66781
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Delay create AliasesAndUsings data until needed #67655
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add info to let named types quickly return 'null' when they have no primary constructor #67652
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix message in make struct member readonly analyzer #67664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not allocate location arrays when determining if a symbol is within a tree #67659
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move to segmented collections to avoid LOH allocations #67658
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC telemetry improvements #67178
    Interactive-EnC
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce allocations due to StateSet enumerations of project/activefile states. #67662
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM Client has no access token despite successful login and scope on Program.cs #47601
  • Exit Kestrel heartbeat thread immediately on stop #47600
  • Add JSON file and UserSecrets configuration providers, and console logging w/ configuration to CreateSlimBuilder #47598
  • [Java Client] HTTP errors during WebSocket handshake not surfaced as HttpRequestExceptions #47597
  • Optimistic Concurrency Lock Support in `IDistributedCache` #47596
  • The new FormInputRenderMode option adds unnecessary noise to query strings #47593
  • add database and table by wizard in blazor united #47592
  • add user role permissions for blazor united #47591
  • Google auth sign in without User becoming authenticated #47590
  • [SignalR] Avoid initial memory allocation in ChannelBasedSemaphore #47588
  • Routing: DfaMatcher match error when literal constrain appears twice in the path segment #47587
    .NET 8 Planning
  • BLAZOR: Integrate CSS (including preprocessors) into .razor files #47586
    Backlog
  • Support DisplayNameAttribute on record properties #47585
  • Open Id Connect cookies are being block by Gateway WAF #47583
  • Multiple Authorize Attributes in MinAPI generates "AuthenticationScheme: Bearer was forbidden." #47581

Closed

  • Hash routing to named element #8393
    8.0-preview4
  • Should razor support syntax for call child component method from parent component? #47500
  • Example in section triggers an exception with the message 'For a dotnetjs resource, custom loaders must supply a URI string' #47589
  • Gets the authorization attribute that has a higher priority on the Action #47361
  • support multiple JSON serialization settings with Newtonsoft.Json in ASP.NET Core #47516
  • Sunset Microsoft.AspNetCore.ConcurrencyLimiter #47532
  • Object reference error from DefaultHttpRequest.set_RouteValues #47573

PullRequests

Created

  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime
  • Return 400 bad request when IOException is thrown when ready form. #47584
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • [release/6.0] Try skipping tests with Japanese chars #47560
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.17
  • Enable StripSymbols under API template when -aot is passed in. #47582
    area-grpc, area-minimal, 8.0-preview4
  • Obsolete concurrency limiter middleware. #47571
    breaking-change, area-runtime, needs-breaking-change-announcement, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Fix Heartbeat logging after disposal #47580
    area-runtime
  • Add metrics to ASP.NET Core #46834
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-gcdump error : Process 1 not running compatible .NET runtime #3808
  • Feature: dotnet-counters should allow users to request that a provider_name only binds to an EventSource #3805
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve Slider Accessibility #14450
  • Android and iOS PlatformImage export/save all ImageFormats other than Jpeg as Png #14449
  • The .net maui title bar disappears and does not re-appear on iOS when using shell.searchhandler #14448
  • IImageLoadingService.FromBytes treats image automatically as PNG #14446
  • Add tests for Resize and DownSize for every platform in Maui.Graphics for both landscape- and portrait-oriented images. #14445
  • [Shell][iOS] Shell search handler icon error after popping modal #14444
  • [Shell][iOS] Error when setting Shell search icon in search handler #14442
  • The content size remains unchanged when it visibility changes at runtime #14441

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow Value Population on Inherited Type Tables in TPT #30647
  • How to query to retrieve all records and also see if the records exists in many-to-many mapping table #30646
  • Reading is extremely slow if there's a value with a large amount of text #30644
  • How to use EF core sqlite with OneDrive? #30642
  • EF Core DbContext caching resulted included entities with dynamic Global filter #30641

Closed

  • SQLite cannot get schema for tables that have names with double quotes #30441
    8.0.0
  • "Scaffolding:ConnectionString" annotation scaffolded #29580
    8.0.0
  • How to troubleshoot Cosmos DB connection errors? #30645
  • SqlException: Login failed for user '{DOMAIN}\{MACHINE NAME}' instead of the user id provided in connection string #30643
  • SaveChanges circular dependency in unique unfiltered index (when change doesn't affect any column from unique index). #30601
    7.0.6
  • Duplicate table alias in generated select query (An item with the same key has already been added) #30358
    7.0.6
  • InvalidOperationException when calling ExecuteUpdate with owned entity & using current value #30528
    7.0.6
  • AutoInclude causes ExecuteDelete to fail #30572
    7.0.6
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30115
    7.0.x
  • Set different configuration in IEntityTypeConfiguration based on provider #30624
  • Casting using an Explicit Static Operator breaks Include Statements #30599

PullRequests

Merged

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Handle quotes in table name in GetSchemaTable #30632
  • Scaffolding: Fix handling of ConnectionString annotation #30631
  • Avoid considering unchanged properties as modified #30640
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30628
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
